title: Survivor: Season 41; Premiere
description:
Survivor is back! ‘Blood and Water’ winner Tyson Apostol is joined by The Ringer’s Juliet Litman to break down changes to the show, give thoughts on the new castaways, and weigh in on the best moments from the episode. Plus, they give out Survivor Superlatives and make their predictions for who could win it all. 
Host: Tyson Apostol 
Guest: Juliet Litman
Fact Checker: Riley McAtee
Editor: Mike Wargon
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
